name: Surfers Up
description:
Surfers Up

Experience the thrill of being at a punk show, complete with crowd surfing action!

Made as an entry for the Hardcore Punk Game Jam 2023

STORY

You're at a concert, enjoying the band, when suddenly out of nowhere a crowd surfer lands right on top of your head! There's only one thing to do: launch that sucker back up into the air!

CONTROLS

Keyboard

  • ASDF Space JKL; = Jump
  • Esc = Exit

Music Credits

  • Pudge - Copout (link)
  • アロキン - Solipsism (link)
  • Keith Doom and the Wrecking Crew - Crack Metal (link)
  • Tendinite - Be Be See (link)
  • Hearse Pileup - Grindstone (link)
  • Blue Wave Theory - Road Hazard (link)
  • Avantist - Veneno (link)
